name: You Owe Me (Spooktober 2021 Gamejam)
description:
(This game was made for the Spooktober 2021 Gamejam with a 7 days time limit!

The theme was Sacrifice!

Glitches, jank to be expected. this game is a solo project)

In this Point-n-click short horror game, you play as someone who is forced to break into a house,  but is worth your life?

Controls:

Mouse for movement and interacting

A and D For looking around

Made in Unreal engine 4

glass breaking sound effect credit: "Class shattering sound effect" by the youtube channel:  Sound Effects.

all other assets and sounds are made by me.

Thanks for playing! C:
